question: Should I grow a beard when I have the right intention and know that i will be fully committed to keeping it?
answer:
QUESTION
Asalamalaikum. I understand that keeping the beard is required, but sometimes it is very difficult to do so in the west. Sometimes i grow it, then shave it off and then grow it again and then shave it off...is what I'm doing more haram than not keeping a beard at all? Also, Should i decide not to keep a beard until i think im ready to make the commitment 100%? JazakAllah
ANSWER
